of_mem_support_derivative:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem of_mem_support_derivative {p : polynomial R} {n : ℕ} (h : n ∈ p.derivative.support) : n + 1 ∈ p.support :=
  mem_support_iff.2 fun h1 : p.coeff (n + 1) = 0 =>
    mem_support_iff.1 h <| show p.derivative.coeff n = 0 by rw [coeff_derivative, h1, zero_mul]
#align of_mem_support_derivative of_mem_support_derivative
nat_degree_eq_zero_of_derivative_eq_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem nat_degree_eq_zero_of_derivative_eq_zero [NoZeroSMulDivisors ℕ R] {f : polynomial R} (h : f.derivative = 0) :
    f.nat_degree = 0 := by
  rcases eq_or_ne f 0 with (rfl | hf)
  · exact nat_degree_zero
  rw [nat_degree_eq_zero_iff_degree_le_zero]
  by_contra' f_nat_degree_pos
  rw [← nat_degree_pos_iff_degree_pos] at f_nat_degree_pos
  let m := f.nat_degree - 1
  have hm : m + 1 = f.nat_degree := tsub_add_cancel_of_le f_nat_degree_pos
  have h2 := coeff_derivative f m
  rw [polynomial.ext_iff] at h
  rw [h m, coeff_zero, ← Nat.cast_add_one, ← nsmul_eq_mul', eq_comm, smul_eq_zero] at h2
  replace h2 := h2.resolve_left m.succ_ne_zero
  rw [hm, ← leading_coeff, leading_coeff_eq_zero] at h2
  exact hf h2
#align nat_degree_eq_zero_of_derivative_eq_zero nat_degree_eq_zero_of_derivative_eq_zero
nat_degree_derivative_lt:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem nat_degree_derivative_lt {p : polynomial R} (hp : p.nat_degree ≠ 0) : p.derivative.nat_degree < p.nat_degree :=
  by
  cases' eq_or_ne p.derivative 0 with hp' hp'
  · rw [hp', polynomial.nat_degree_zero]
    exact hp.bot_lt
  · rw [nat_degree_lt_nat_degree_iff hp']
    exact degree_derivative_lt fun h => hp (h.symm ▸ nat_degree_zero)
#align nat_degree_derivative_lt nat_degree_derivative_lt
nat_degree_derivative_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem nat_degree_derivative_le (p : polynomial R) : p.derivative.nat_degree ≤ p.nat_degree - 1 :=
  by
  by_cases p0 : p.nat_degree = 0
  · simp [p0, derivative_of_nat_degree_zero]
  · exact Nat.le_pred_of_lt (nat_degree_derivative_lt p0)
#align nat_degree_derivative_le nat_degree_derivative_le
mem_support_derivative:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem mem_support_derivative [NoZeroSMulDivisors ℕ R] (p : polynomial R) (n : ℕ) :
    n ∈ (derivative p).support ↔ n + 1 ∈ p.support :=
  by
  suffices ¬p.coeff (n + 1) * (n + 1 : ℕ) = 0 ↔ coeff p (n + 1) ≠ 0 by
    simpa only [mem_support_iff, coeff_derivative, ne.def, Nat.cast_succ]
  rw [← nsmul_eq_mul', smul_eq_zero]
  simp only [nat.succ_ne_zero, false_or_iff]
#align mem_support_derivative mem_support_derivative

theorem derivative_prod {s : Multiset ι} {f : ι → polynomial R} :
    (Multiset.map f s).prod.derivative =

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem derivative_mul {f g : polynomial R} : derivative (f * g) = derivative f * g + f * derivative g :=
  calc
    derivative (f * g) = f.sum fun n a => g.sum fun m b => «expr • » (n + m) (C (a * b) * X ^ (n + m - 1)) :=
      by
      rw [mul_eq_sum_sum]
      trans; exact derivative_sum
      trans;
      · apply finset.sum_congr rfl
        intro x hx
        exact derivative_sum
      apply finset.sum_congr rfl; intro n hn; apply finset.sum_congr rfl; intro m hm

      · exact congr_arg _ C_mul_X_pow_eq_monomial.symm
      dsimp; rw [← smul_mul_assoc, smul_C, nsmul_eq_mul']; exact derivative_C_mul_X_pow _ _
    _ =
        f.sum fun n a =>
          g.sum fun m b =>
            «expr • » n (C a * X ^ (n - 1)) * (C b * X ^ m) + C a * X ^ n * «expr • » m (C b * X ^ (m - 1)) :=
      sum_congr rfl fun n hn =>
        sum_congr rfl fun m hm => by
          cases n <;> cases m <;>
              simp_rw [add_smul, mul_smul_comm, smul_mul_assoc, X_pow_mul_assoc, ← mul_assoc, ← C_mul, mul_assoc, ←
                pow_add] <;>
            simp only [nat.add_succ, nat.succ_add, nat.succ_sub_one, zero_smul, add_comm]
    _ = derivative f * g + f * derivative g :=
      by
      conv =>
        rhs
        congr
        ·rw [← sum_C_mul_X_pow_eq g]
        ·rw [← sum_C_mul_X_pow_eq f]
      simp only [sum, sum_add_distrib, finset.mul_sum, finset.sum_mul, derivative_apply]
      simp_rw [← smul_mul_assoc, smul_C, nsmul_eq_mul']

theorem derivative_map [Semiring S] (p : polynomial R) (f : «expr →+* » R S) :

  rw [sum_over_range' _ _ (n + 1) ((le_max_left _ _).trans_lt (lt_add_one _))]

  all_goals intro n; rw [zero_mul, C_0, zero_mul]

    (fun p₁ p₂ ih₁ ih₂ => by rw [eval₂_add, derivative_add, ih₁, ih₂, derivative_add, eval₂_add, add_mul]) fun n r ih =>
    by
    rw [pow_succ', ← mul_assoc, eval₂_mul, eval₂_X, derivative_mul, ih, @derivative_mul _ _ _ X, derivative_X, mul_one,
      eval₂_add, @eval₂_mul _ _ _ _ X, eval₂_X, add_mul, mul_right_comm]

#align derivative_C_mul_X_pow derivative_C_mul_X_pow
derivative_C_mul_X:
theorem derivative_C_mul_X (a : R) : derivative (C a * X) = C a := by
  simpa only [C_mul_X_eq_monomial, derivative_monomial, Nat.cast_one, mul_one]
#align derivative_C_mul_X derivative_C_mul_X
derivative_C:
@[simp]
theorem derivative_C {a : R} : derivative (C a) = 0 := by simp [derivative_apply]
#align derivative_C derivative_C
degree_derivative_lt:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem degree_derivative_lt {p : polynomial R} (hp : p ≠ 0) : p.derivative.degree < p.degree :=
  (finset.sup_lt_iff <| bot_lt_iff_ne_bot.2 <| mt degree_eq_bot.1 hp).2 fun n hp =>
    lt_of_lt_of_le (WithBot.some_lt_some.2 n.lt_succ_self) <| finset.le_sup <| of_mem_support_derivative hp
#align degree_derivative_lt degree_derivative_lt
degree_derivative_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem degree_derivative_le {p : polynomial R} : p.derivative.degree ≤ p.degree :=
  if H : p = 0 then le_of_eq <| by rw [H, derivative_zero] else (degree_derivative_lt H).le
#align degree_derivative_le degree_derivative_le
degree_derivative_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem degree_derivative_eq [NoZeroSMulDivisors ℕ R] (p : polynomial R) (hp : 0 < nat_degree p) :
    degree (derivative p) = (nat_degree p - 1 : ℕ) :=
  by
  have h0 : p ≠ 0 := by
    contrapose! hp
    simp [hp]
  apply le_antisymm
  · rw [derivative_apply]
    apply le_trans (degree_sum_le _ _) (finset.sup_le fun n hn => _)
    apply le_trans (degree_C_mul_X_pow_le _ _) (WithBot.coe_le_coe.2 (tsub_le_tsub_right _ _))
    apply le_nat_degree_of_mem_supp _ hn
  · refine' le_sup _
    rw [mem_support_derivative, tsub_add_cancel_of_le, mem_support_iff]
    · show ¬leading_coeff p = 0
      rw [leading_coeff_eq_zero]
      intro h
      rw [h, nat_degree_zero] at hp
      exact lt_irrefl 0 (lt_of_le_of_lt (zero_le _) hp)
    exact hp
#align degree_derivative_eq degree_derivative_eq
coeff_iterate_derivative_as_prod_range:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
theorem coeff_iterate_derivative_as_prod_range {k} (p : polynomial R) :
    ∀ m : ℕ,
      ((«expr ^[ ]» derivative k) p).coeff m =
        «expr • »
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" (range k)
            (m + k - i))
          (p.coeff (m + k)) :=
  by
  induction' k with k ih
  · simp
  intro m
  calc
    ((«expr ^[ ]» derivative (k + 1)) p).coeff m =
        «expr • »
            (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" (range k)
              (m + k.succ - i))
            (p.coeff (m + k.succ)) *
          (m + 1) :=
      by rw [function.iterate_succ_apply', coeff_derivative, ih m.succ, nat.succ_add, nat.add_succ]
    _ =
        «expr • »
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" (range k)
              (m + k.succ - i) *
            (m + 1))
          (p.coeff (m + k.succ)) :=

    _ =
        «expr • »
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod"
            (range k.succ) (m + k.succ - i))
          (p.coeff (m + k.succ)) :=
      by rw [prod_range_succ, add_tsub_assoc_of_le k.le_succ, nat.succ_sub le_rfl, tsub_self]

coeff_iterate_derivative_as_prod_Ico:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ^[ ]» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
theorem coeff_iterate_derivative_as_prod_Ico {k} (p : polynomial R) :
    ∀ m : ℕ,
      ((«expr ^[ ]» derivative k) p).coeff m =
        «expr • »
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod"
            (Ico m.succ (m + k.succ)) i)
          (p.coeff (m + k)) :=
  by
  induction' k with k ih
  · simp only [add_zero, forall_const, one_smul, Ico_self, eq_self_iff_true, function.iterate_zero_apply, prod_empty]
  · intro m
    rw [function.iterate_succ_apply', coeff_derivative, ih (m + 1), ← Nat.cast_add_one, ← nsmul_eq_mul', smul_smul,
      mul_comm]
    apply congr_arg₂
    · have set_eq : Ico m.succ (m + k.succ.succ) = Ico (m + 1).succ (m + 1 + k.succ) ∪ {m + 1} :=
        by
        simp_rw [← nat.Ico_succ_singleton, union_comm, nat.succ_eq_add_one, add_comm (k + 1), add_assoc]
        rw [Ico_union_Ico_eq_Ico] <;> simp_rw [add_le_add_iff_left, le_add_self]
      rw [set_eq, prod_union, prod_singleton]
      · rw [disjoint_singleton_right, mem_Ico]
        exact fun h => (nat.lt_succ_self _).not_le h.1
    · exact congr_arg _ (nat.succ_add m k)

coeff_derivative:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem coeff_derivative (p : polynomial R) (n : ℕ) : coeff (derivative p) n = coeff p (n + 1) * (n + 1) :=
  by
  rw [derivative_apply]
  simp only [coeff_X_pow, coeff_sum, coeff_C_mul]
  rw [sum, finset.sum_eq_single (n + 1)]
  simp only [Nat.add_succ_sub_one, add_zero, mul_one, if_true, eq_self_iff_true]; norm_cast
  · intro b
    cases b
    · intros
      rw [Nat.cast_zero, mul_zero, zero_mul]
    · intro _ H
      rw [nat.succ_sub_one b, if_neg (mt (congr_arg nat.succ) H.symm), mul_zero]
  · rw [if_pos (add_tsub_cancel_right n 1).symm, mul_one, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, mem_support_iff]
    intro h
    push_neg  at h
    simp [h]
#align coeff_derivative coeff_derivative
